ack.p: We thank Ciara Burnham and Bert Kerstetter for support and also Princeton University’s Climate Futures Initiative, Woodrow Wilson School, Center for Human Values, Institute for International and Regional Studies, Andlinger Center for Energy and the Environment, and the Princeton Environment Institute. We are grateful for comments from David Anthoff, Robert Kopp, Aurélie Méjean, and Stéphane Zuber. We also thank two anonymous reviewers for their many helpful suggestions.
